name: CHASMED
description:
CHASMED is a game where you must cross a large canyon by jumping between fast moving platforms. Collect coins as you go. Don't fall! (Submitted for THE LEGO® NINJAGO® & 1-BUTTON GAME CHALLENGE 2021)

=========== CONTROLS ===========

Any button: Jump forward.

Tab: Menu.

Exit mouse: ESC

=========== CREDITS ===========

LEGO MICROGAME ASSETS BY LEGO / UNITY.
